The Company of the Trollblood Blade was a renowned and chartered adventuring company of Cormyr, active in the early 14 century DR.
By the , the Company of the Trollblood Blade was a famous group of heroes in service of the Crown of Cormyr. Even mention of their name caused whispers and excited murmurs. The company was mentioned by King Azoun Obarskyr IV when then-unknown adventurers â€“ Swords of Eveningstar, were granted Cormyrs official adventuring charter. King Azoun held a grand ceremony in the town of Espar and competed the young adventurers to the still famed Company of the Manticore Cloaks, predicting the Swords bright future, reaching the fame and prosperity of the Trollbloods and the Company of the Manticore Cloaks.
